member.name: M:VendingMachine.Controllers.ProductsController.Get
member.summary: Gets a list of all the stock products.

member.name: M:VendingMachine.Controllers.ProductsController.Take(System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes on unit of a given product. I also validates if the product is available and if the user amount is enough.

member.name: M:VendingMachine.Controllers.WalletController.Get
member.summary: Gets the current amount in the user's wallet.

member.name: M:VendingMachine.Controllers.WalletController.Post(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Adds a coin of the given value to the user's wallet.

member.name: M:VendingMachine.Controllers.WalletController.Delete
member.summary: Removes and returns all the coins in the user's wallet.

member.name: M:VendingMachine.Extensions.AddServiceExtensions.AddSingletonServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the Singleton needed services that hold the data.
